required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of IBI302 in Patients With nAMD
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Active-controlled Phase II Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of IBI302 in Subjects With Neovascular Age-related Macular Degeneration

brief_summary.textblock: The study is designed for multi-center, randomized, double-blind, active-controlled phase II study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of IBI302 in subjects with neovascular age-related macular degeneration.

secondary_outcome.description: the proportion if BCVA improvement ≥0,5,10 or 15 letters at week 12, 28, 36 and 52.

secondary_outcome.measure: the anatomical effects of IBI302 on OCT
secondary_outcome.description: the mean change of central subfield thickness from BL to week 52 at week 12, 28, 36 and 52

secondary_outcome.measure: the anatomical effects of IBI302 on FFA
secondary_outcome.description: the change of CNV area, CNV leakage area, total lesion area from BL to week 36 or 52
the incidence of ocular AE or any systemic AE, TEAE, SAE
the positive rate of anti-drug antibody and neutralizing antibody

arm_group.arm_group_label: cohort 1 IBI302 treated with high dose level of IBI302
cohort 1 IBI302 treated with low dose level of IBI302

intervention.description: Low dose IBI302 intravitreal injection given as every other month after three loading monthly injection
intervention.arm_group_label: cohort 1 IBI302 treated with low dose level of IBI302

intervention.description: High dose IBI302 intravitreal injection given as every other month after three loading monthly injection
intervention.arm_group_label: cohort 1 IBI302 treated with high dose level of IBI302
